name: Guideline Technologies, Inc.
description: Developer of an automated investment technology designed to revolutionize online retirement planning. The company's technology incorporates a participant's financial ecosystem, making recommendations and adjustments on an ongoing basis, enabling users to optimize their retirement potential plan and save for the future.
